text: Leaving the next day, weAV and NKJV have ‘we who were Paul's companions’, based on some 13% of the Greek manuscripts. Some 46% have ‘those who were Paul's companions’. I follow the best line of transmission, with some 39% here, in reading “we”. came to Caesarea; and entering the house of Philip the evangelist (being of ‘the Seven’), we stayed with him.
